name: Truck-Kun Isekai Collector
description:
You have been selected as an agent of “Transdimensional Heroes”. Our company bring solutions to worlds that are suffering crisis by offering our best and greatest "Heroes" (SUBJET TO DISPONIBILITY). After a long and extensive research, we select the best candidate possible for the crisis in question. Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to search for them and “lightly touch them” with our Transdimensional Relocating Unlimited Charged Kick-Start, or T.R.U.C.K for short, so the chosen one can be sent to another world where they would be beginning a beautiful and prosper life. But be aware everything you touch with T.R.U.C.K will be sent too.

Disclaimer:

This is a silly parody game, we don’t condone violence in any way. Hitting people is not only dangerous but also illegal. Don’t try any of this on the real world.
